Despite my initial optimism I ran into a number of difficulties with this project. While not cancelled, the scope has been greatly reduced so as to remain manageable. Let this be a lesson to anyone new to modding: start small and get the basics down.

Anyway...

The Kodiak Heavy Rover!

The Kodiak will be a large-ish, single part rover (minus the wheels) that will function as a mobile science lab with room to fit four Kerbals.

The Inspiration:

Image courtesy of drednorzt.blogspot

This is still very much a WIP, updates (and pictures!) will come slowly. Stay tuned

Modeling: 90% - some minor adjustments foreseeable.

UV mapping: 10% - super frustrating!

Texturing: 5% - color palette decided!

Unity: 60% - animation for experiment bay is the final hurdle, along with textures.

Configs: 60%

Edited December 8, 2014 by I.O.M.
